section:
You come to a shrine gateway that stands close to the outskirts of Kwaidan Forest. Dawn sunlight is turning the morning mist to gold dust and the trees to faded watercolours, but strangely there are no birds singing. You look in through the gate. The courtyard is filled with long grass and weeds. The shrine buildings look derelict and overgrown. Then you notice a man standing on the porch of the main shrine.
Go through the gate Continue on your way
